original_title: Nanna & Lil' Puss Puss in 'Off the Record'
overview: Nanna's not-so-favorite nephew, Stench, Nanna has warned him about playing that Devil music, but to no avail; that is until Lil' Puss Puss intervenes...dousing his dreams of Rock and Roll stardom once and for all.
title: Nanna & Lil' Puss Puss in 'Off the Record'
